chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: list (card bool)
P: list (card bool)

Goal:
A <<= P -> itau2 P (f P A) = tau2 A

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
itau2 = fix itau2 (X : Type) (P : stack X) (A : list nat) {struct A} : string X := match A with | [] => [] | i :: A0 => snd (nth i P ([], [])) ++ itau2 X P A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> list nat -> string X Arguments itau2 {X}%type_scope _ _%list_scope
tau2 = fix tau2 (X : Type) (A : stack X) {struct A} : string X := match A with | [] => [] | (_, y) :: A0 => y ++ tau2 X A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> string X Arguments tau2 {X}%type_scope
f = fun P A : stack bool => omap (fun x : card bool => pos card_eq x P) A : stack bool -> stack bool -> list nat
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
card = fun X : Type => (list X * list X)%type : Type -> Type Arguments card _%type_scope
itau_tau1 : forall P A : list (card bool), A <<= P -> itau1 P (f P A) = tau1 A
iPCPb = fun P : stack bool => exists A : list nat, (forall a : nat, a el A -> a < | P |) /\ A <> [] /\ itau1 P A = itau2 P A : stack bool -> Prop
PCPX = fun (X : Type) (P : stack X) => exists A : list (card X), A <<= P /\ A <> [] /\ tau1 A = tau2 A : forall X : Type, stack X -> Prop Arguments PCPX {X}%type_scope
itau2_app : forall A0 B : list nat, itau2 ?P (A0 ++ B) = itau2 ?P A0 ++ itau2 ?P B where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type] ?P : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- stack ?X]
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ x el l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : Forall P [] | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l) Arguments Forall [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Forall_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall_cons [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
sym_mono : forall A P : stack nat, A <<= P -> sym A <<= sym P
incl_Exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), l1 <<= l2 -> Exists P l1 -> Exists P l2
incl_Forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), l2 <<= l1 -> Forall P l1 -> Forall P l2
MPCP = fun '(x, y, P) => exists A : stack nat, A <<= (x, y) :: P /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A : card nat * stack nat -> Prop
MPCPb = fun '(x, y, P) => exists A : stack bool, A <<= (x, y) :: P /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A : card bool * stack bool -> Prop
tau2_app : forall A0 B : stack ?X, tau2 (A0 ++ B) = tau2 A0 ++ tau2 B where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type]
tau2_cards : forall x : list ?X, tau2 (cards x) = x where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type]
cBPCP : forall (P : stack bool) (u : string bool), derivable P u u -> BPCP P
Inductive derivable (X : Type) (P : stack X) : string X -> string X -> Prop := der_sing : forall x y : list X, (x, y) el P -> derivable P x y | der_cons : forall (x y : list X) (u v : string X), (x, y) el P -> derivable P u v -> derivable P (x ++ u) (y ++ v) Arguments derivable {X}%type_scope Arguments der_sing {X}%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments der_cons {X}%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
BPCP_ind : forall (P : stack bool) (P0 : Prop), (forall u : string bool, derivable P u u -> P0) -> BPCP P -> P0
BPCP_sind : forall (P : stack bool) (P0 : SProp), (forall u : string bool, derivable P u u -> P0) -> BPCP P -> P0
Forall_forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Forall P l < -> (forall x : A, x el l -> P x)
derivable_sind : forall (X : Type) (P : stack X) (P0 : string X -> string X -> SProp), (forall x y : list X, (x, y) el P -> P0 x y) -> (forall (x y : list X) (u v : string X), (x, y) el P -> derivable P u v -> P0 u v -> P0 (x ++ u) (y ++ v)) -> forall s s0 : string X, derivable P s s0 -> P0 s s0
derivable_ind : forall (X : Type) (P : stack X) (P0 : string X -> string X -> Prop), (forall x y : list X, (x, y) el P -> P0 x y) -> (forall (x y : list X) (u v : string X), (x, y) el P -> derivable P u v -> P0 u v -> P0 (x ++ u) (y ++ v)) -> forall s s0 : string X, derivable P s s0 -> P0 s s0
Inductive BPCP (P : stack bool) : Prop := cBPCP : forall u : string bool, derivable P u u -> BPCP P
Exists_exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Exists P l < -> (exists x : A, x el l /\ P x)
dec2bool : forall P : Prop, dec P -> bool
itau1 = fix itau1 (X : Type) (P : stack X) (A : list nat) {struct A} : string X := match A with | [] => [] | i :: A0 => fst (nth i P ([], [])) ++ itau1 X P A0 end : forall X : Type, stack X -> list nat -> string X Arguments itau1 {X}%type_scope _ _%list_scope
EnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T_prod : forall (f1 : nat -> option ?X) (f2 : nat -> option ?Y), EnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T' ?X f1 -> EnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T' ?Y f2 -> EnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T' (?X * ?Y) (EnumerabilityFacts.prod_enum f1 f2) where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type] ?Y : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type]
sym_app : forall P R : stack nat, sym (P ++ R) = sym P ++ sym R
ListEnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T_list : forall L : nat -> list ?X, ListEnumerabilityFacts.list_enumerator__T' ?X L -> ListEnumerabilityFacts.list_enumerator__T' (list ?X) (ListEnumerabilityFacts.L_list L) where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type]
find_some : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (x : A), find f l = Some x -> x el l /\ f x = true
itau1_app : forall A0 B : list nat, itau1 ?P (A0 ++ B) = itau1 ?P A0 ++ itau1 ?P B where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type] ?P : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- stack ?X]
der_sing : forall (P0 : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X), (x, y) el P0 -> derivable P0 x y where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type]
incl_filter : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l <<= l
filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : list A), x el filter f l < -> x el l /\ f x = true
der_cons : forall (P0 : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X) (u v : string ?X), (x, y) el P0 -> derivable P0 u v -> derivable P0 (x ++ u) (y ++ v) where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type]
tau1_cards : forall x : list ?X, tau1 (cards x) = x where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type]
enumerable = fun (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) => exists f : nat -> option X, enumerator f P : forall X : Type, (X -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments enumerable {X}%type_scope _%function_scope
tau1_app : forall A0 B : stack ?X, tau1 (A0 ++ B) = tau1 A0 ++ tau1 B where ?X : [P : list (card bool) A : list (card bool) |- Type]
dPCP = fun (X : Type) (P : stack X) => exists u : string X, derivable P u u : forall X : Type, stack X -> Prop Arguments dPCP {X}%type_scope
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), x el l -> f x el map f l
find_none : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), find f l = None -> forall x : A, x el l -> f x = false

intros A P H.
unfold itau2, tau2, f in *.  
induction H.  
- reflexivity.
- simpl. apply f_equal. assumption.
Qed.
